title: Please RIOT Ban DO SOMETHING WITH THESE USELESS PLAYERS!!! TROLLS!! WASTING EVERYONES TIME!
body: riot. in straight forward manner. can you do something about players that just don't do anything in the game. I don't mind people who try and lose. but im talking about players that just spectate. they literally don't do anything there still online but just roaming. theres no ban for roaming people. you should make up a way to spectate their performances so you know that's why we get pissed off and swear and go toxic. cause people are just not playing the game. ive reported many players because of that. but it doesn't seem to have a punishment.  please do something
